task: Quantify numerical error in determinant evaluation for G({x_e})
python_snippet:
import numpy as np
from project.generating_functional import generate_K, compute_determinant
xs = np.linspace(-0.9, 0.9, 100)
errors = []
for x in xs:
    K = generate_K([x, x])  # example 6-j config
    det1 = compute_determinant(K)
    det2 = compute_determinant(K.astype(np.float64))
    errors.append(abs(det1 - det2))
assert max(errors) < 1e-10

task: Perform local sensitivity analysis of 3nj symbol under rational perturbations of input spins
python_snippet:
import sympy as sp
from project.su2_3nj import generate_3nj
base = generate_3nj(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6)
eps = sp.Rational(1, 1000)
delta = generate_3nj(1, 2+eps, 3, 4, 5, 6) - base
assert delta.expand().as_ordered_terms()[0].as_coeff_exponent(eps)[0] != 0

task: Compare rational (SymPy) vs float-based (NumPy) evaluations of G({x_e}) for benchmark configurations
python_snippet:
from sympy import Rational
from project.generating_functional import G_exact, G_numeric
xs = [Rational(1,3), Rational(1,4)]
exact = G_exact(xs)
numeric = G_numeric([float(x) for x in xs])
assert abs(float(exact) - numeric) < 1e-10
